name: Righteous Sentinel
description: The Righteous Sentinel is a powerful large construct with strong defensive and offensive capabilities, showcasing a reinforced form that embodies its lawful good alignment.
memorable: Its reflective abilities allow it to rebound attacks and its immunity to various conditions makes it an exceptional protector.
goals: To serve as a guardian, protect its allies, and confront evil.
relations: May be encountered alongside celestial beings or allied constructs.
environment: Typically found in places of order, such as temples or fortresses.
strengths: High strength and resilience, notable defensive capabilities including damage immunities.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to thunder damage and limited agility with average dexterity.
attacks: Utilizes melee slam attacks with significant bludgeoning damage; capable of inflicting psychic damage and causing fear with its Warp Reflection ability.
most_powerful_ability: The Spell-Deflecting Mirror allows it to reflect ranged spells back at their casters, disrupting enemy magic.
skills: Proficient in perception, giving it an enhanced ability to notice threats around it.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells.
Reflective Aggression enhances its attack rolls based on recent damage.
Immutable Form prevents alteration of its shape.
Conditions like charmed and paralyzed do not affect it.
test_queries: construct with high strength and resilience
